name: MP Investment Management A/S
goal:
MP Investment Management A/S driver virksomhed iht. tilladelse fra Finanstilsynet til at drive virksomhed som Forvalter af Alternative Investeringsfonde (FT nr. 23069), jf. Lov om forvaltere af alternative investeringsfonde m.v. § 11, stk. 3.

MP Investment Management A/S har over 100 mia. DKK under forvaltning (AUM), der hovedsagelig består af pensionsmidler.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
